entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Sunday 12 March 2023
